tool_description: Analyzes document metadata including creation date, modification history, software used, and file properties to detect suspicious patterns.

document_data.description: Base64 encoded document for metadata analysis

check_creation_software.description: Whether to analyze document creation software

expected_creation_date.description: Expected document creation date for comparison

error_messages: Metadata extraction failed: Unable to extract metadata from document.
Document corrupted: Document file appears to be corrupted.
Unsupported file type: Document type not supported for metadata analysis.
Invalid expected date: Expected creation date must be in ISO 8601 format.
usage: Provide document for metadata analysis. Enable software and modification history checking. Optionally specify expected creation date for comparison.

creation_software.description: Software used to create the document

modification_count.description: Number of times document was modified

suspicious_patterns.description: List of suspicious metadata patterns detected

metadata_consistent.description: Whether metadata appears consistent and authentic
